## IMemberUpdate interface

Request body used to add a member to a conversation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMemberUpdate 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [owner](./core-conversations.imemberupdate.owner.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the user associated with the membership should be an owner of the conversation. |
